Man who stole $1500 in clothes from Taranaki shop and cut off ankle bracelet finds God https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/man-who-stole-1500-in-clothes-from-taranaki-shop-and-cut-off-ankle-bracelet-finds-god/N2CMQHV4DREY5NG77Z6U2MTOIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/man-who-stole-1500-in-clothes-from-taranaki-shop-and-cut-off-ankle-bracelet-finds-god/N2CMQHV4DREY5NG77Z6U2MTOIU/ Tara ShaskeyHe was only three days into his home detention sentence when he cut off his bracelet. Tue, 21 Nov 2023 08:17:41 +0000 Leighton Antoni Johnson cut off his monitoring bracelet while he was on home detention, then studied religion behind bars while on remand. Photo / Michael Craig

Tue, 21 Nov 2023 07:00:00 +0000 Tama Bracken's relentless assault on a man as he lay prone and vulnerable on the ground has seen him jailed for 14 months.

Tue, 21 Nov 2023 06:54:46 +0000 New Zealand pilot Philip Mark Mehrtens with the West Papua Liberation Army. Mehrtens has been a hostage of the separatist group since February 2023.
